io.micronaut.discovery.kubernetes

Class KubernetesDiscoveryClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.discovery.kubernetes.KubernetesDiscoveryClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Described, DiscoveryClient, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    @Singleton
 @Requires(env="k8s")
public class KubernetesDiscoveryClient
extends Object
implements DiscoveryClient
    A DiscoveryClient implementation for Kubernetes. Kubernetes uses environment variables so no API calls is required.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    graemerocher
